description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Network Address Translation (NAT) denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43562), apply the relevant KB updates provided below to ensure system security.

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit).
2. Download and install the appropriate update package from the links below:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
3. Restart your system after the installation.

**Details**:
These updates address the out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the NAT service, potentially preventing denial of service scenarios. Ensure the device builds are compatible before initiating the update process.
